# Frostburn (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]] \[[[Cold Spells|cold]]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 7th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 7]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude half

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Frostburn (WotC), pg. 95

This spell functions like *[[Frostburn, Lesser (Spell)|lesser frostburn]]*, except that it deals 3d12 points of frostburn damage +1 point per caster level (maximum +20).
